headline: Marriott Unveils New Ad Campaign: 'Travel Shapes Us'
summary: Marriott ditches mundane advertising tropes in its new marketing campaign. Instead, it tries to tap into the emotional alchemy of travel itself.

raw.headline: Marriott Unveils New Ad Campaign: 'Travel Shapes Us'

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 to Approach with Caution
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.

raw.headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock with Exciting Potential and 2 to Approach with Caution
raw.summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.

headline: Hyatt Hotels Corporation: Decent, But Needs Improvement To Justify The Upside
summary: Hyatt Hotels shows potential but faces constraints from its owned and leased properties. Check out my recommendation for H stock.

headline: Valmont Has Arrived at The Ritz-Carlton Spa, Bali
summary: The Ritz-Carlton, Bali welcomes Valmont, a renowned Swiss brand with first-patented Salmon DNA cellular cosmetics, for immediate and long-lasting anti-aging treatments at The Ritz-Carlton Spa, Bali. Guests are invited to indulge in the art of timeless beauty through the exclusive Valmont's anti-aging skin care treatment. The Ritz-Carlton Spa is the first resort spa in Bali to feature Valmont products.
